text: thumb 5% Anonychia - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Brachydactyly syndrome - Congenital onset - Hidrotic ectodermal dysplasia - Nail dystrophy - Sensorineural hearing impairment - Small nail - Toe syndactyly - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage of
